items: Are all secrets and API keys excluded from version control (e.g., in .env files)?
Is HTTPS enforced for all external communications?
Are dependencies scanned for known vulnerabilities (e.g., using Snyk or Dependabot)?
Is input validation performed on all API endpoints to prevent injection attacks?
Are proper authentication and authorization checks applied to all protected routes?
Is sensitive data (passwords, PII) encrypted at rest and in transit?
